raw:
{{Infobox item poe2
| name           = Nemnok's Decree
| icon           = poe2 thieves_letter icon.png
| description    = THIS IS THE WILL OF NEMNOK THE DEVOURER, MASTER OF THE MOUNTAIN.

BRING ME THREE TOMES OF POWER FROM THE GODLESS LANDS BEYOND THE DROWNED BARROWS.

THE FIRST IS IN A FAR-FLUNG SWAMP, GUARDED BY ANCIENT AND POWERFUL HAGS. THE SECOND IS IN A GRAVEYARD OF LISTING SHIPS, CLUTCHED BY THE HUNGRY DEAD. THE LAST IS NESTLED IN THE HIDDEN ARCHIVE OF AN UNDYING SPELLCASTER.

SERVE ME AND YOUR FAITH WILL BE REWARDED. DISAPPOINT ME, BETRAY ME, AND I WILL ADD YOUR FLESH TO THE VELLUM OF MY GRIMOIRE.

NEMNOK
